婆.definition: (bound form) grandmother; (bound form) matron; (bound form) mother-in-law; (slang) femme (in a lesbian relationship)

婆娑.definition: to swirl about; (of leaves and branches) to sway

婆婆媽媽.definition: effeminate; old-womanish; garrulous; fainthearted; overly careful; overly sensitive; maudlin

婆家.definition: husband's family (traditionally where the wife moves into)

婆羅洲.definition: Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
